verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: said] [ARG1: he was thinking " very seriously " about pardoning the late boxer Muhammad Ali , who refused to be drafted into the Army during the Vietnam War and whose conviction was overturned by the Supreme Court in 1971 .] Trump added he 's considering pardons for " some others . "

President Donald Trump on Friday said he [V: was] thinking " very seriously " about pardoning the late boxer Muhammad Ali , who refused to be drafted into the Army during the Vietnam War and whose conviction was overturned by the Supreme Court in 1971 . Trump added he 's considering pardons for " some others . "
